content:
Should we go ahead and rename https://github.com/gdcc/dataversecommunity.global to https://github.com/gdcc/gdcc.io ? Or maybe https://github.com/gdcc/www.gdcc.io?

Also, should we redirect https://www.gdcc.io to https://gdcc.io since it's shorter?

Finally, should we merge sphinx-markdown into main and just use the main branch going forward?
I have no idea and am fine with whatever someone in charge decides. Let me know if some DNS needs to be taken care of.
Can we make just gdcc.io (no www) work, technically? I'd prefer the shorter form, like we do with dataverse.org
I just switched us to the main branch. @Philipp Conzett heads up that I deleted the old sphinx-markdown branch. Please use main from now on. Thanks.
If you go to the old repo at https://github.com/gdcc/dataversecommunity.global it will redirect to the new one at https://github.com/gdcc/www.gdcc.io
@Philip Durbin Thanks for the heads-up! I'll stick to main from now on.
